name: Keyhole Spy: Erotic Police
description:
Every man wants to fall into the hands of sexy female police officer, doesn't he? Dangerous and powerful, charming and seductive - it's all about her!
And now imagine that you broke the law: you feel the adrenaline rush because of fear of being arrested. And then you meet a charming girl in police uniform. You start to feel an incredible varieties of emotions! You no longer know what you want more, to be released or punished.
Make your secret dream come true and experience a storm of emotions with Keyhole Spy: Erotic Police game!



Charming and sexy police women (who can make you want to turn yourself in immediately) will meet you in the game. And if you behave like a law-abiding citizen and play by their rules, you'll get to see more than anyone else.
If you want to see a charming beauty wearing an erotic police uniform, you need to score as many points as possible. Remember that the further you go, the closer you'll get to the cherished goal!

  • Hot half-naked police women
  • Minigame with dangerous police items
  • The opportunity to look at the girls in the gallery



Keyhole Spy: Erotic Police is a game where you'll meet incredibly attractive police women. But first, you have to play the game and make a row of three police items. Handcuffs? Maybe. Gun? Everything is possible.
Enjoy the company of hot beauties from the police and find out what would happen when you don’t obey the law ;)
